Headline: Growth Strategist & Business Builder | GTM, Product, Partnerships | Founder @ Conwert.in | Fintech, Proptech, F&B | Ex-EnKash, OYO, IWG | UCLA PGP
Comment:
AI throws up a lot of fluff Avik Ashar. 
But it is what it is - generative i.e it keeps learning & adapting based on the kind of work you give it. Prompting correctly is such a game changer because the more specific you prompt, the better results you start getting. And even then there may be some fluff in the responses.
But to your point, operating AI is a MUST today. Although I somehow feel that we are dumbing down our own cognitive ability by delegating everything to AI. What do you think?
